definition: to revolve around/to center on (an issue)
to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
surname Wei
variant of 繞|绕[rao4], to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex

sentences.english: Therefore, the dissertation concentrates on the research of localization in WSNs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本论文围绕无线传感器网络定位技术展开研究。

sentences.english: The castle was embosomed in huge rocks.
sentences.chinese: 那座城堡有巨岩围绕着。

sentences.english: Stalks of grain, representing the peasant population, surround the gate.
sentences.chinese: 围绕着天安门的稻穗代表了中国的农民阶级。

sentences.english: But the mystique that surrounded the terrorist chieftain in life is persisting in death.
sentences.chinese: 但是围绕这位恐怖主义首领一生的谜团却并未解开。

sentences.english: They plopped each turtle into a small pool surrounded by magnetic coils.
sentences.chinese: 他们把每个海龟放进有磁线圈围绕的小池子里。

sentences.english: The main topic of this paper is about steel pipe strapping machine.
sentences.chinese: 本论文主要是围绕钢管打捆机研制开发进行的。

sentences.english: Development governance encompasses the software development lifecycle.
sentences.chinese: 开发治理围绕着软件开发生命周期。

sentences.english: And this article makes a simple discussion about our Foreign Trade system.
sentences.chinese: 本文即围绕我国外贸代理制度做出初步探讨。

sentences.english: A host of misunderstanding swirls around Francis Schaeffer's reputation today.
sentences.chinese: 今天有许多错误的理解围绕着薛华。

sentences.english: There are limits and acceptable behavior that surround the exercise of delegated authority.
sentences.chinese: 存在围绕实行委托权力的限制和可接受的行为。

sentences.english: Promotes the desired work culture around the Winning Ways of the IHG Hotels Group and the brand ethos.
sentences.chinese: 围绕洲际酒店集团的致胜之道的企业文化和品牌理念。

sentences.english: No, you can see them by poking around Google Maps .
sentences.chinese: 不，你可以看到他们的洪学智就是围绕谷歌地图。

sentences.english: This thesis is to analyze his theory of journalism occupation from the before-mentioned aspects.
sentences.chinese: 本文将围绕以上这几个方面来讨论他的新闻职业观。

sentences.english: The tape acts as ribbing that we will be sewing around.
sentences.chinese: 这条带子就像书的肋骨，帮助我们围绕它进行缝订。

sentences.english: Amid all the pomp and celebration, one of the darker aspects to the wedding was how thin she was too.
sentences.chinese: 围绕着盛况和庆典，美中不足的一点是，新娘太瘦了。

sentences.english: The act of turning or winding or folding around a central axis .
sentences.chinese: 围绕一个中心轴翻或绕或叠的动作。

definition: to unfold/to carry out/to be in full swing/to launch
to focus
core/nucleus
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
theme/subject
to construct (sth abstract)
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
to rely on/to depend on/support
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to stick closely to (a topic or theme etc)
to put emphasis on/to stress
leading/dominant/prevailing/to lead/to direct/to dominate
to put effort into sth/to try really hard
to concentrate/to centralize/to focus/centralized/concentrated/to put together
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to build/to construct
